title: Swap illustrated spice images for photographic generated assets

requirements.summary: Update Products section product image URLs to use new photographic spice assets served from /assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: Products grid no longer uses any of these illustration assets: /assets/generated/spice-illustration-chili.dim_800x600.png, /assets/generated/spice-illustration-turmeric.dim_800x600.png, /assets/generated/spice-illustration-assorted.dim_800x600.png
Each product card renders a photographic image (object-cover) with no broken images in the Products section
All product images are served as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated (referenced via /assets/generated/...)

file_operations.description: Add the generated photographic close-up image asset for dried red chili peppers as a static public asset.
Add the generated photographic close-up image asset for turmeric (roots or powder) as a static public asset.
Add the generated photographic close-up image asset for cumin seeds as a static public asset.
Add the generated photographic close-up image asset for coriander seeds as a static public asset.
Add the generated photographic close-up image asset for black peppercorns as a static public asset.
Add the generated photographic close-up image asset for green cardamom pods as a static public asset.

Ensure no remaining references to the illustration files in this section.
